title: Strengthening Teaching Practice Competencies: Real-World Assessment and Enhancement of Teaching Skills in Virtual Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three strategies to facilitate instructor-learner interaction in virtual educational settings to real-world cases.
Learners can utilize at least five instructional competency evaluation criteria for designing online science courses.
Learners can operate and assess effective real-time educational sessions in limited technological environments (smartphone-centric).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
